original_text: And he shall spread forth his hands in the midst of them, as he that swimmeth spreadeth forth his hands to swim: and he shall bring down their pride together with the spoils of their hands.
korean_text: 그가 헤엄치는 자가 헤엄치려고 손을 폄 같이 그 속에서 그의 손을 펼 것이나 여호와께서 그의 교만으로 인하여 그 손이 능숙함에도 불구하고 그를 누르실 것이라

sentences.original_text: And he shall spread forth his hands
as he that swimmeth spreadeth forth his hands
and he shall bring down their pride
together with the spoils of their hands
